description: RxClass drug member relationships from NLM RxNav classMembers API

schedule.description: Monthly on the 1st at 5 AM (2 hours after RxClass completes)

processing_notes.method: Distributed processing using Spark mapPartitions - each worker processes partition of classes in parallel
processing_notes.rate_limiting: 0.2s delay per API call to be respectful to NLM servers
processing_notes.data_format: JSON API responses aggregated per class
processing_notes.parallelization: 10 workers (large), ~2,200 classes per worker for 22k total classes
processing_notes.estimated_runtime: 5-10 minutes for full dataset (vs 75-90 min sequential)
